comment.author: 41909278@N08
comment._content:
First of 7 such aircraft sold to Peru. The triangular window below the fixed canopy was a test installation, which was not applied to the other 6 aircraft. In this case, the NAA accounting number and the client identifier were identical: NA-50. This appears to be a test flight at Inglewood, given the lack of national insignia. 

Doug MacPhail
